column2: The Realm has merchants trading resources.
This province is laden with gold veins.
This province is laden with silver veins.
This province is laden with high quality iron veins.
This province is laden with many elephants producing quality ivory.
This province is highly fertile and produces excessive quantities of grain.
This province has rich waters and produces excessive quantities of fish.
This province is laden with quality deposits of stone.
This province is laden with huge groves of quality timber.
The region is Rich in gold, these mines will dig the precious ore from the ground.
The region is Rich in silver, these mines will dig the precious ore from the ground.
The region is rich in iron, these mines will dig the useful ore from the ground.
The region is rich in stone, these master crafters will cut and shape them into building supplies.
The region is rich in timber, these master crafters will cut and shape them into building supplies.
The Realm deals in resources, and with trade comes merchants, this building is their meeting ground, granting the holder a nice boon.
